transcript: so I got this new flannel my housekeeper cleaned it incredibly part of it was that it shrunk and then it also like wasn't soft anymore it got like all like those little hairy beads all over in the moment it was an expensive flannel and I was kind of annoyed and then I remembered the frame of the veteran and I was like okay what if every time I washed a flannel it always became like this and every flannel I had was this way and this is just how flannels were what would I think I was like I wouldn't think this was a big deal and just like that it was gone something that would have been an annoyance just wasn't anymore if something bad happens imagine that has already happened a thousand times before
